## setHeaders() function

Creates a new response overriting all headers with new ones.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function setHeaders<B>(resObject: ResponseObject<B>, headers: OutgoingHttpHeaders): ResponseObject<B>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  resObject | <code>ResponseObject&lt;B&gt;</code> | response to set new headers on |
|  headers | <code>OutgoingHttpHeaders</code> | HTTP response headers to set |

<b>Returns:</b>

`ResponseObject<B>`

New [response](./prismy.responseobject.md) with new headers set
